about_the_game:
Those were all just accidents, but is that true?

Late Amusement is a first-person survival horror from a small indie studio. You play as young student Liam Snow and survive for as long as you can to uncover the secrets of the theme park.

Synopsis

Fantasy Amusement Land, one of the most iconic amusement parks in the whole country.

Families from every state visited and enjoyed its fun activities.

But many people just came for the park characters. They were friendly, interactive and just magical.

It was the park for everyone

On october 8th 1978 Fantasy Amusement Land had to shut its doors due to many safety violations which were ignored.

Many years later Liam Snow a young ongoing author decides to visit lost places to gather inspirations for his first story. While reading a few old newspaper articles he read about the amusement park and decided to visit the place, not knowing whats coming to him...

Features

An immersive horror experience: Fighting them is pointless – the only chance to survive is if you run or hide.

Stay out of sight and hearing: Opponents have good eyes and ears, which can make you an easy target, so always be on your guard.

Out of sight, on the lookout: Use the many hideouts and distractions in the area to keep your enemies away.

Immersive World: A detailed world that resembles a real theme park and allows players to immerse themselves in the world.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features a realistic atmosphere. Players will find bloody locations and can die through the enemies in the game. the death animations are a sequence of a brutal killing of the character.
